Draft Rating:

D

Willis Reed ranks in the 30th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Reed's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 6 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:

Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Derrick Coleman with 1th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Kenny Anderson with 2th pick but was worth 4th pick.
  • Drafted Rex Walters with 16th pick but was worth 31th pick.
